response.overview: Question 1 (10 marks)  a. (1test + 1stupid green boy + 2big chops) x the pressure generated by a family WhatsApp group chat = DISHKYAAON!!!  ​  ​'Dishkyaaon!!!' is a multimedia frame by frame 2D animated short film that switches back and forth between digital and traditional animation. The title, based off of an old Indian film soundbite, denotes the sound of a punch, a gunshot, or a minor explosion. Much like this on·o·mat·o·poe·ia, the film aims to feel like an emotional uppercut to your face, taking you back to those childhood memories that you don't want to remember, Finally, I spelled my dear friend Alex Ferrandiz' name incorrectly in my credits, feel free to point and laugh at me for my blunder.
response.title: Dishkyaaon!!!
